# Robots.txt for GKS Logistics
# Allow all search engines to crawl the site

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://www.gkslogistics.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow temporary or development files
Disallow: /temp_keys.txt
Disallow: /*.tmp

# Allow all language versions
Allow: /en/
Allow: /tu/
Allow: /md/

# Allow important resources
Allow: /assets/
Allow: /css/
Allow: /js/
Allow: /lang/

# Crawl-delay (optional - uncomment if needed)
# Crawl-delay: 1
